title: SocGen, Credit Suisse halt Russian commodity trade finance deals - Bloomberg News - Reuters
content: SocGen, Credit Suisse halt Russian commodity trade finance deals - Bloomberg News  Reuters
description: France's Societe Generale and Switzerland's Credit Suisse Group have halted the finance of commodities trading from Russia as the Ukraine war fueled concerns about the widening impact of sanctions, Bloomberg News reported on Sunday citing people familiar with the matter.
